token_info.name: Three Body Problem #018 - ALTER
token_info.description: I am trying to find interesting patterns among the chaos. Press X to explore new (previously unsold) seeds. Press Z to interfere/alter the simulation somehow. This effect is different with every objkt. Find the source code here https://github.com/atomoton/threebodyproblem/blob/master/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 to see any changes to the simulation or visualization code. twitter.com/aebrer
